name: NBCNews
text: A Southern California sheriff's deputy accused of stealing items from an unoccupied home days after he responded to a report of a death there is facing a burglary charge, officials say. https://t.co/4uXOzi6fXY

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Dr. Fauci says he disagrees with President Trump's comments that the country is rounding the final turn of the coronavirus pandemic and encourages caution as the Fall season arrives. https://t.co/jaZBr0l3KG

name: NBCNews
text: Israel and the Gulf state of Bahrain agreed to normalize relations in a major diplomatic breakthrough brokered by President Trump. https://t.co/oCPHM3W26E

name: NBCNews
text:
President Trump and Joe Biden mark 9/11 with very different tones.

While Trump spoke of US strength at Flight 93 memorial, Biden consoled families at ground zero in New York. https://t.co/pH9ybl2xC3

name: NBCNews
text: “They tell me to just wait. My bills are all behind, my pantry is empty, my pockets and savings are dry [and] we’re about to lose internet — so the kids won't even be able to do their online schooling,” David Kruszewski said. https://t.co/TmoI66CY1J

name: NBCNews
text: The Office of Management and Budget issued a directive prohibiting departments from using federal funds to administer diversity training for executive branch staff that incorporate teachings about critical race theory and white privilege. https://t.co/AXX1impl9n

name: NBCNews
text:
Bystander video from a bowling alley in Louisiana appears to show a police officer punching a Black teen during an arrest. 

The officer has been placed on administrative leave and the incident is under internal investigation.
https://t.co/TObHmM82Rs
